name: Embeddable
description: Embeddable is a platform that enables marketers to create and embed interactive tools on their websites to drive conversions, using AI and no developer support.
longDescription: Embeddable is a platform designed for marketers and agencies to build, customize, and embed interactive tools on websites without needing developers. Its mission is to empower users to create engaging experiences like newsletters, chatbots, and gamified widgets using AI and rich design tools. It serves users by offering seamless integration with various web platforms and third-party services, enhancing lead generation and sales. The platform focuses on providing advanced features for performance, SEO, and security, making it suitable for marketing teams and agencies looking to enhance user engagement and conversion rates.
features: AI-Powered Creation: Instantly generate and refine embeddable experiences using advanced AI, reducing manual effort.
Cross-Platform Compatibility: Works seamlessly across platforms like Shopify, Wix, Webflow, Notion, Canva, Lovable, and Bolt.
Customizable Design Tools: Offers animations, advanced UX, 3D, and creative tools to bring ideas to life without limits.
Integration Capabilities: Connect embeddables to LLMs, email, analytics, CRM, and other services for automated experiences.
Version Control: Allows users to roll back, iterate, and manage embeddable experiences with ease.
Project Management for Teams: Includes collaboration tools, permissions, project dashboards, and handoff features for marketing teams and agencies.
Performance and SEO Optimization: Ensures blazing fast loading, search-optimized, and always up-to-date embeddables.
Media Support: Provides effortless image and asset uploads for enhanced content management.
Content Management Rules: Allows defining editable content for clients, ensuring security and consistency.
Pre-Built Embeddables: Offers ready-to-use tools like newsletter sign-up bars, AI chatbots, and spinning wheel games for immediate deployment.

faqs.question: What is Embeddable used for?
faqs.answer: Embeddable is used to build and embed interactive tools on websites to drive conversions, such as newsletters, chatbots, and gamified widgets.

faqs.question: Do I need developers to use Embeddable?
faqs.answer: No, Embeddable is designed for marketers and does not require developers, using AI to handle the creation process.

faqs.question: Can I customize the embeddables?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can customize embeddables using AI suggestions, manual edits, rich design tools, and your own media.

faqs.question: Which platforms does Embeddable support?
faqs.answer: Embeddable works seamlessly across platforms like Shopify, Wix, Webflow, Notion, Canva, Lovable, and Bolt.

faqs.question: How can I integrate Embeddable with other services?
faqs.answer: You can connect embeddables to LLMs, email, analytics, CRM, and more for powerful, automated experiences, with further details at https://embeddable.co/integrations.

faqs.question: Is Embeddable suitable for marketing teams?
faqs.answer: Yes, it offers project management tools, content management rules, and collaboration features specifically for marketing teams and agencies.

faqs.question: How do I get started with Embeddable?
faqs.answer: Start by providing a prompt, sharing your passion, or dropping your website URL, and Embeddable will recommend and help build a tool.

faqs.question: Can I suggest features I saw on other sites?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can share a link via https://embeddable.co/contact?topic=prompt, and Embeddable will help bring it to life.

faqs.question: Does Embeddable handle performance and SEO?
faqs.answer: Yes, it ensures blazing fast loading, is search-optimized, and always up to date.

faqs.question: What kind of embeddables can I create?
faqs.answer: You can create tools like newsletter sign-up bars, social proof testimonials carousels, ebook download widgets, AI chatbots, exit-intent popups, and spinning wheel games.
